server
Interface RemotableDB

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Database
public interface RemotableDB
extends java.rmi.Remote

Allows a remote database to be used with RMI. only the methods outlined in this interface can be called remotely. All Methods must throw a RemoteException

Method Summary
 void addRecord(Contractor newContractor, long clientID)
          Adds a new record to the database by calling the DBEngine addContrator method
 void bookContractor(java.util.List<java.lang.String> key, java.lang.String customer, long clientID)
          Calls the DBEngine method bookContractor() passing in the values the user has entered.
 void deleteRecord(java.util.List<java.lang.String> key, long clientID)
          Calls the DBEngine objects deleteRecord method
 java.util.List<Contractor> getAllRecords()
          Calls the DBEngine method getAllRecords() and returns a full list of the database records in an ArrayList.
 java.util.List<Contractor> searchDB(SearchMode mode, java.lang.String query)
          Calls the overloaded DBEngine method search passing in the search mode and the query entered by the user
 java.util.List<Contractor> searchDB(java.lang.String nameQuery, java.lang.String locationQuery)
          Calls the overloaded DBEngine method search passing in the name and location queries entered by the user

getAllRecords

java.util.List<Contractor> getAllRecords()
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException

searchDB

java.util.List<Contractor> searchDB(SearchMode mode,
                                    java.lang.String query)
                                    throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException
Calls the overloaded DBEngine method search passing in the search mode and the query entered by the user

Parameters:
mode - Enum constant. Determines which contractor attribute to search
query - The regex query as a string
Returns:
An ArrayList of Contractor objects that match the search conditions.
Throws:
java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException
java.rmi.RemoteException

searchDB

java.util.List<Contractor> searchDB(java.lang.String nameQuery,
                                    java.lang.String locationQuery)
                                    throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                                           java.rmi.RemoteException
Calls the overloaded DBEngine method search passing in the name and location queries entered by the user

Parameters:
nameQuery - The regex query in the name field as a string
locationQuery - The regex query in the city field as a string
Returns:
An ArrayList of Contractor objects that match the search conditions.
Throws:
java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException
java.rmi.RemoteException
